mapper.sql: fixBorrow.ID, fixBorrow.NAME, fixBorrow.STATUS, fixBorrow.PLAN_ACCOUNT, fixBorrow.LOWEST_ACCOUNT, fixBorrow.MOST_ACCOUNT, fixBorrow.LOCK_LIMIT, fixBorrow.LOCK_STYLE, fixBorrow.LOCK_ENDTIME, fixBorrow.APR, fixBorrow.SUCCESS_TIME, fixBorrow.VALID_TIME, fixBorrow.CONTENT, fixBorrow.SENDMESSAGE, fixBorrow.ADDTIME, fixBorrow.ADDIP, fixBorrow.LAST_MODIFY_USER, fixBorrow.LAST_MODIFY_TIME, fixBorrow.LAST_MODIFY_REMARK, fixBorrow.CONTRACT_NO, fixBorrow.BID_PASSWORD, fixBorrow.REMARK, fixBorrow.PUBLISH_TIME, fixBorrow.TENDER_TIMES, fixBorrow.ACCOUNT_YES, fixBorrow.END_TIME, fixBorrow.SOURCE_FROM, fixBorrow.AREA_TYPE, fixBorrow.AREA_CHANGE_TIME
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT fixBorrow.* ,tenderrecord.totalInvest,repayment.repaymentMoney,fixaccount.USE_MONEY FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_id ,SUM(REPAYMENT_YESINTEREST) totalInvest from rocky_b_tenderrecord trecord group by USER_id ) tenderrecord on (fixBorrow.id=tenderrecord.user_id)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FIX_BORROW_ID ,SUM(INTEREST) repaymentMoney from t_fix_repaymentrecord fixrepayment where STATUS ='1' group by FIX_BORROW_ID ) repayment on (fixBorrow.id=repayment.FIX_BORROW_ID)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FIX_BORROW_ID ,USE_MONEY from t_fix_account faccount ) fixaccount on (fixBorrow.id=fixaccount.FIX_BORROW_ID) where 1=1
${orderSql}
FOR UPDATE

SELECT
FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow inner join (SELECT fix_borrow_id,addtime from t_fix_operation_log where OPER_TYPE =7 ) tfo on (fixBorrow.id = tfo.fix_borrow_id ) where 1=1
order by tfo.addtime desc
SELECT count(*) FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow inner join (SELECT fix_borrow_id,addtime from t_fix_operation_log where OPER_TYPE =7 ) tfo on (fixBorrow.id = tfo.fix_borrow_id ) where 1=1

SELECT count(DISTINCT fixBorrow.id) FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_id ,SUM(REPAYMENT_YESINTEREST) totalInvest from rocky_b_tenderrecord trecord group by USER_id ) tenderrecord on (fixBorrow.id=tenderrecord.user_id)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FIX_BORROW_ID ,SUM(INTEREST) repaymentMoney from t_fix_repaymentrecord fixrepayment where STATUS ='1' group by FIX_BORROW_ID ) repayment on (fixBorrow.id=repayment.FIX_BORROW_ID)
LEFT JOIN (SELECT FIX_BORROW_ID ,USE_MONEY from t_fix_account faccount ) fixaccount on (fixBorrow.id=fixaccount.FIX_BORROW_ID) where 1=1
and fixBorrow.STATUS in (3,5,7,-2,-1)
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_fix_borrow (NAME, STATUS, PLAN_ACCOUNT, LOWEST_ACCOUNT, MOST_ACCOUNT, LOCK_LIMIT, LOCK_STYLE, LOCK_ENDTIME, APR, SUCCESS_TIME, VALID_TIME, CONTENT, SENDMESSAGE, ADDTIME, ADDIP, LAST_MODIFY_USER, LAST_MODIFY_TIME, LAST_MODIFY_REMARK, CONTRACT_NO, BID_PASSWORD, REMARK, PUBLISH_TIME, ADDUSER, TENDER_TIMES, ACCOUNT_YES, END_TIME,SOURCE_FROM) VALUES ( #{name}, #{status},#{planAccount}, #{lowestAccount}, #{mostAccount}, #{lockLimit}, #{lockStyle}, #{lockEndTime}, #{apr}, #{successTime}, #{validTime}, #{content}, #{sendMessage}, now(), #{addIp}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{lastModifyRemark}, #{contractNo}, #{bidPassword}, #{remark},#{publishTime}, #{userId}, #{tenderTimes}, #{accountYes}, #{endTime}, #{sourceFrom} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID

INSERT INTO t_fix_operation_log (USER_ID, USER_TYPE, FIX_BORROW_ID, FIX_TENDER_REAL_ID, OPER_TYPE, ADDTIME, ADDIP, REMARK, PLATFORM) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userType},#{fixBorrowId}, #{fixTenderRealId}, #{operType}, now(), #{addIp}, #{remark}, #{platForm} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.select: select USER_ID, (SELECT name from rocky_staff where id =operlog.USER_ID ) userName,USER_TYPE,FIX_BORROW_ID,FIX_TENDER_REAL_ID,OPER_TYPE,ADDTIME,ADDIP,REMARK,PLATFORM from t_fix_operation_log operlog where OPER_TYPE in (-3,3) and FIX_BORROW_ID=#{id} order by id desc

SELECT IfNULL(sum(total.accountCollectMoney),0) accountCollectMoney, IfNULL(SUM(total.accountUserMoney),0) accountUserMoney , IfNULL(sum(total.accountRepayMentMoney),0) accountRepayMentMoney, IfNULL(SUM(total.accountHistoryInvest),0) accountHistoryInvest from ( select IfNULL(SUM(REPAY_ACCOUNT),0) accountCollectMoney,'' accountUserMoney,'' accountRepayMentMoney,'' accountHistoryInvest from rocky_b_collectionrecord where user_id >=100000000 and status = '0' union all select '',IfNULL(SUM(USE_MONEY),0),'','' from t_fix_account where FIX_BORROW_ID in(SELECT id from t_fix_borrow where STATUS=5) union all select '','',IfNULL(SUM(REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT),0),'' from t_fix_repaymentrecord where status ='0' union all select '','','',IfNULL(SUM(REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT-CAPITAL),0) from t_fix_repaymentrecord where status ='1' ) total
SELECT MAX(CONTRACT_NO) from t_fix_borrow where contract_no like concat('%',#{contractNo},'%')

select
from t_fix_borrow fixBorrow where fixBorrow.status in (3,5) order by id DESC limit 1;

select
from t_fix_borrow fixBorrow where fixBorrow.status in (3,5) and fixBorrow.id != #{id} order by id DESC limit 1;
select *,DATEDIFF(CURDATE(),IFNULL(tender_bid_date,'2999-01-01'))as diffTenderDays from t_fix_borrow fixBorrow where fixBorrow.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update t_fix_borrow
NAME = #{name},
STATUS = #{status},
PLAN_ACCOUNT = #{planAccount},
ACCOUNT_YES = #{accountYes},
LOWEST_ACCOUNT = #{lowestAccount},
MOST_ACCOUNT = #{mostAccount},
LOCK_LIMIT = #{lockLimit},
LOCK_STYLE = #{lockStyle},
LOCK_ENDTIME = #{lockEndTime},
apr = #{apr},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime},
CONTENT = #{content},
SENDMESSAGE = #{sendMessage},
LAST_MODIFY_USER = #{lastModifyUser}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = now(),
LAST_MODIFY_REMARK = #{lastModifyRemark},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo},
BID_PASSWORD = #{bidPassword},
REMARK = #{remark},
PUBLISH_TIME = #{publishTime},
TENDER_TIMES = #{tenderTimes},
ACCOUNT_YES = #{accountYes},
BID_PASSWORD = null,
END_TIME = #{endTime},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo},
AREA_TYPE = #{areaType},
AREA_CHANGE_TIME = #{areaChangeTime},
where ID = #{id}
update t_fix_tender_detail set STATUS =2 where FIX_BORROW_ID = #{id}

update rocky_account account ,t_fix_tender_detail detail set account.total=account.total+IFNULL(detail.ACCOUNT,0), account.use_money =account.use_money+IFNULL(detail.ACCOUNT,0), account.DRAW_MONEY=account.DRAW_MONEY+IFNULL(detail.DRAW_MONEY,0), account.NO_DRAW_MONEY=account.NO_DRAW_MONEY+IFNULL(detail.NO_DRAW_MONEY,0) where account.user_id = detail.user_id and detail.fix_borrow_id =#{id}
mapper.select: {call fix_tender(#{borrowid,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{fixborrowid,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{type,mode=IN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msg,mode=OUT,jdbcType=VARCHAR})}
mapper.insert: INSERT into rocky_accountlog (USER_ID,TYPE,TOTAL,MONEY,USE_MONEY,NO_USE_MONEY,COLLECTION,TO_USER,ID_TYPE,REMARK,ADDTIME,ADDIP,DRAW_MONEY,NO_DRAW_MONEY, e_use_money,e_freeze_money,e_collection,IS_CUSTODY) SELECT a.user_id ,'fix_exit',a.total,b.ACCOUNT money ,a.use_money ,a.no_use_money,a.collection , #{toUser} ,6,'定期宝撤销', UNIX_TIMESTAMP(), #{addip},a.draw_money,a.no_draw_money,a.e_freeze_money,a.e_collection,0 from rocky_account a, t_fix_tender_detail b where a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID and b.fix_borrow_id =#{id}
mapper.select: select PLAN_ACCOUNT, LOCK_LIMIT, APR,LOWEST_ACCOUNT,MOST_ACCOUNT,SUCCESS_TIME,PUBLISH_TIME,VALID_TIME,END_TIME , CONCAT( DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(SUCCESS_TIME,INTERVAL LOCK_LIMIT MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d'),DATE_FORMAT(PUBLISH_TIME,' %H:%i:%s')) as defaultPubTime from t_fix_borrow where id=${id}

select count(1) from t_fix_borrow fb INNER JOIN t_fix_account fa on fa.FIX_BORROW_ID = fb.id where 1=1 and fb.LOCK_ENDTIME <= CURDATE() and fa.COLLECTION>0 and fa.USE_MONEY<fa.CAPITAL and fb.status = 5

select fb.id,fb.CONTRACT_NO,fb.PLAN_ACCOUNT,fb.LOCK_LIMIT,fb.lock_endtime,fa.capital, ( SELECT Ifnull(Sum(rbc.CAPITAL),0) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord rbc INNER JOIN rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt ON rbc.TENDER_ID = rbt.ID WHERE rbc.STATUS = 0 AND rbt.USER_ID = fb.ID AND rbt.STATUS = 1 )as zrMoney from t_fix_borrow fb INNER JOIN t_fix_account fa on fa.FIX_BORROW_ID = fb.id where 1=1 and fb.LOCK_ENDTIME <= CURDATE() AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt WHERE rbt.USER_ID = fb.ID AND rbt.`STATUS` = 0 LIMIT 0,1) and fa.COLLECTION>0 and fa.USE_MONEY<fa.CAPITAL and fb.status = 5 order by fb.lock_endtime ASC
select IFNULL(SUM(fa.USE_MONEY),0) as sumUseMoney from t_fix_account fa INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fb on fb.ID = fa.FIX_BORROW_ID where 1=1 and fb.status = 5
select IFNULL(SUM(fa.USE_MONEY),0) as sumUseMoneyYes from t_fix_account fa INNER JOIN t_fix_borrow fb on fb.ID = fa.FIX_BORROW_ID where 1=1 and fb.status = 5 and fb.LOCK_ENDTIME > CURDATE() + 2
select count(1) from t_fix_borrow tfb INNER JOIN t_fix_account tfa on tfb.ID = tfa.FIX_BORROW_ID where 1=1 and tfa.COLLECTION=0 and tfa.USE_MONEY = tfa.CAPITAL and tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME <= NOW()

select tfb.id,tfb.CONTRACT_NO,tfb.PLAN_ACCOUNT, tfb.LOCK_LIMIT,tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME, tfb.APR from t_fix_borrow tfb INNER JOIN t_fix_account tfa on tfb.ID = tfa.FIX_BORROW_ID where 1=1 and tfa.COLLECTION=0 and tfa.USE_MONEY = tfa.CAPITAL and tfb.LOCK_ENDTIME <= NOW()
select name,status, last_modify_user,last_modify_time from t_fix_borrow where 1=1 and id = ${id} for update
mapper.update: update t_fix_borrow set status = ${status}, last_modify_user=${lastModifyUser},last_modify_time=NOW() where 1=1 and id = ${id}
mapper.select: select count(1) from t_fix_borrow where 1=1 and LOCK_ENDTIME <= NOW() and id = ${id}

SELECT ,fa.USE_MONEY as fixAccountUserMoney ,fa.CAPITAL FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow INNER JOIN t_fix_account fa ON fixBorrow.ID = fa.FIX_BORROW_ID WHERE fixBorrow.`STATUS` = 5 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord rbt WHERE rbt.USER_ID = fixBorrow.ID AND rbt.`STATUS` = 0 LIMIT 0,1) AND LOCK_ENDTIME <= CURDATE() AND fa.USE_MONEY < fa.CAPITAL AND fa.COLLECTION > 0 AND fixBorrow.ID = #{id} FOR UPDATE;
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FIX_BORROW SET STATUS = #{status}, LAST_MODIFY_USER = #{lastModifyUser}, LAST_MODIFY_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() WHERE ID= #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT ,fa.USE_MONEY as fixAccountUserMoney FROM t_fix_borrow fixBorrow INNER JOIN t_fix_account fa ON fixBorrow.ID = fa.FIX_BORROW_ID WHERE fixBorrow.`STATUS` = 5 AND fa.USE_MONEY > 0
AND fixBorrow.ID not in (select FIX_BORROW_ID from t_fix_account_log where `TYPE` = 6 group by FIX_BORROW_ID)
AND fixBorrow.ID in (select FIX_BORROW_ID from t_fix_account_log where `TYPE` = 6 group by FIX_BORROW_ID)
AND fixBorrow.LOCK_ENDTIME > DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 3 DAY ) ORDER BY fixBorrow.SUCCESS_TIME ASC FOR UPDATE;
select from t_fix_borrow fixBorrow where id = #{id} for update
